---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_document
params:
  input_dir_removed: input_removed
  input_dir_added: input_added
  output_fig_removed: "removed.pdf"
  output_fig_added: "added.pdf"
---

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(taproom)
  library(glue)
})
```

```{r}
d <- dir(params$input_dir_removed,
         patter="*.tsv",
         full.names=TRUE)
```


```{r}
df <- map_dfr(d, read_tsv)
```

```{r}
df$cohort <- stringr::str_to_title(gsub("1", "", df$cohort))

ggplot(df, aes(x = threshold, y = mean_unknown, colour = condition)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.2) +
  facet_wrap(~ cohort) +
  cowplot::theme_cowplot() +
  theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_line(colour="grey50", size=0.2, linetype = 2),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill = 'white'),
        strip.text = element_text(face = "bold"),
        legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_colour_manual(values = jackson_basel_colours(),
                      name = "High confidence cell type\nusing full marker information") +
  labs(x = "Probability threshold for assigning cells",
       y = "% assigned to unknown/other")
```

```{r}
pdf(params$output_fig_removed, width=9,height=5)
print(last_plot())
dev.off()
```


# Added


```{r}
d <- dir(params$input_dir_added,
         pattern="*.tsv",
         full.names=TRUE)
```


```{r}
df2 <- map_dfr(d, read_tsv)
```

```{r}
df2$cohort <- stringr::str_to_title(gsub("1", "", df2$cohort))

ggplot(df2, aes(x = threshold, y = 100 * prop_assigned, colour = condition)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.2) +
  facet_wrap(~ cohort) +
  cowplot::theme_cowplot() +
  theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_line(colour="grey50", size=0.2, linetype = 2),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill = 'white'),
        strip.text = element_text(face = "bold"),
        legend.position = "bottom") +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Dark2",
                      name = "Fake cell type") +
  labs(x = "Probability threshold for assigning cells",
       y = "% assigned to fake cell type")
```

```{r}
pdf(params$output_fig_added, width=9,height=5)
print(last_plot())
dev.off()
```
